name: Michael Johnson
summary: Strategic operations executive with 17+ years of experience in supply chain management, process optimization, and organizational growth. Passionate about driving efficiency and scalability.

skills.specialized skill: Supply Chain Management, Process Optimization, Agile Operations, Team & Workforce Scaling, International Expansion

experience.description: Reduced supply chain costs by 25% through process automation. Implemented agile operations, reducing product delivery time by 40%. Scaled workforce from 100 to 500 employees, ensuring seamless growth.
Developed data-driven KPIs, improving operational efficiency by 30%. Led international expansion into 5 new markets.

enrichment parameters.Employment Pattern & Progression: Progressed from VP of Operations to Chief Operating Officer, demonstrating career growth and advancement.
enrichment parameters.Company Type & Sector: Worked in tech sector, specifically in companies focused on growth and scaling.
enrichment parameters.Education Quality & Ranking: Graduated from top-tier institutions, Wharton School and Georgia Tech, indicating high-quality education.
enrichment parameters.Skill Demand & Market Relevance: Skills in supply chain management, process optimization, and agile operations are highly relevant in today's market.
enrichment parameters.Leadership Experience: Held leadership roles at ScaleUp Inc. and GrowthTech, managing teams and scaling operations.
enrichment parameters.Budget & Project Management: Managed supply chain costs and implemented process automation projects, indicating strong budget and project management skills.
enrichment parameters.International Experience & Mobility: Led international expansion at GrowthTech, demonstrating international experience.
enrichment parameters.Soft Skills from Sales Calls: Not available from provided CV data.
enrichment parameters.Personality & Behavioral Traits: Demonstrates high conscientiousness and openness, moderate extraversion, and low neuroticism.
enrichment parameters.Future Career Goals (Sales-Inferred): Likely interested in roles that involve strategic operations and organizational growth.
enrichment parameters.Salary Expectations (Sales-Inferred): Given the seniority of roles and experience, likely to have high salary expectations.
enrichment parameters.JD Enrichment with Implied Preferences: Prefers roles that involve strategic decision-making, process optimization, and team management.
enrichment parameters.Cultural Fit Indicators: Likely to fit well in a culture that values efficiency, growth, and innovation.
